Text.val: Program can be used without input parameter to produce a list of all currencies
15.11.2012 AS SCR#17691 fixed form output with expressions where attribute was ANSI instead of Unicode

SQL_STMT_U.val: select BANK_CURRENCY, cast(sum(BANK_NEWBALANCE) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(BANK_CREDITLINE_OPEN) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BANK :2 group by BANK_CURRENCY order by BANK_CURRENCY FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: -- uses for "SQL_OverviewBanksTotals" (could be changed in child task)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO, min(BANK_LEDG_NO_ADVANCES), min(BANK_NAME), min(cast(BANK_NEWBALANCE as decimal(13,2))), cast(sum(LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT - LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT) as decimal(13,2)), min(cast(BANK_CREDITLINE_OPEN as decimal(13,2))) from :1/BANK Left outer join :1/LGCD on LGCD_ADMNO = BANK_ADMNO and LGCD_LDGR_NO = BANK_LEDG_NO_ADVANCES and LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK = 'N' and LGCD_DATE > ':3' where BANK_CURRENCY = ':2' group by BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO order by BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS
